p: For the traits grain yield and grain number per pot, line×CO 2 treatment interactions were detected: at increasing CO 2, these traits increased more strongly in Certo than in HOSUT. There were also a line×N fertilization interaction for these traits since there was a clear increase in grain yield and grain number per pot at high N supply for HOSUT but not for Certo. For harvest index, a line×N fertilization interaction occurred with a slight increase for HOSUT at high N supply but a strong decrease for Certo ( Fig. 4).
